{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ever-Wandering Pilgrim.
Surpass {5}{B} [i]({5}{B}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Ever-Hungry Tanbaly gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.
